name: Landlubbers Episode 2: Something's Fishy
description:
Landlubbers is a goofy episodic adventure game where you play as Fiona, an office assistant charged with pointless tasks by her boss, Linda.

In Episode 2, Something's Fishy,  Linda installs a koi pond in the office in the middle of a global pandemic. Fiona is deemed an essential worker who has to feed the fish.

Controls:

*Move around by LEFT CLICK

*See names of objects you can interact with by HOVERING

*If you want to interact with an object, RIGHT CLICK on it and the action menu will show up. You can choose from one of three actions: look at, use, and talk to. Choose the action you want to take by left-clicking on it.

*To check inventory, type "i". To interact with anything in the inventory, it's the same as the above controls.  You can use your inventory items with objects by left-clicking on the item, then clicking on the object you want to use it with. You can also do this to give items to characters. Note this isn't "drag-and-drop" in the traditional sense. Click on the item first, your cursor will turn into the item, then click on another object.

[If you need any additional help, check out our in-depth blog post "The Landlubber's Guide to Playing Landlubbers."]

Credits:

Story by Katie Brookoff and Vikram Oberoi

Programming by Vikram Oberoi

Art by Katie Brookoff
